name: Pixel Pizza A Muerte
description:
You're a piece of pizza and your mission is to defeat sushi.

In this game you will help a slice of pizza to defeat its worst enemy, the shushi!, for that you will use your weapons and fight against different enemies and a final boss along five intense waves

Art by Carlos Javier Barbero.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Left Click - Shoot
Mouse Wheel / 1,2,3 - Change Weapon

Have fun!
